config.label: Did you during the past 12 months exhibit  any  portion  of  your  stock at  any  Exhibition,  other  than  one promoted  or  financially  assisted by  any Public Authority or by any Trade  Association,  or  entrust goods  for  any  display  or performance?

Do  you  exhibit  goods,  in  any showcase  in  any  hotel,  club  or elsewhere  away  from  your premises?
If  so,  give  full particulars  including  values  and details  of  protections  (i.e.  type  of glass locks and the like)

What limit is required for any one loss for property elsewhere than in the  Proposer's  premises  stated  in Question 'State address of the premises to which the policy is to apply'? (This  limit  will  NOT  apply  to property  in  any  safe  deposit  vault or bank vault).
Are the premises occupied at night
Are there any openings leading to cellar or basement from outside the shop?
If so, please give details and protections.
Give details of the following and how they are protected:
all windows other than Display Windows
all skylights or fanlights or roof openings
Give full details of the type of glass in all your display windows and/or outside showcases
Are all sections of the windows containing jewellery, gold, silver, platinum, pearls and precious stones and watches substantially partitioned off from the remainder of the display?
What precautions do you take to protect the rear of your display windows?
Are they kept permanently locked and keys removed
Are interior showcases similarly locked and keys removed?
AT NIGHT and at all other times when premises are not open for business.
Are all display windows and/or outside showcases protected externally by either shutters or by a grille?
Give full particulars of such protections and state how they are secured.
Does this protection cover the entire front of your premises?
Are all your display windows and/or outside showcases containing jewellery, gold, silver, platinum, pearls and precious stones and watches protected internally either by:
fixed grilles covering the whole of the display?
Hanging glass suspended between the window glass and the display?
Give details and type of glass
Can the internal grilles or the suspended glass be reached under or over or around
If so, state name and forward copy of maker's specification to Underwriters (or if not available give full details)
Are holdup/panic buttons incorporated in the system
Is the system maintained under contract?
Give the maker's name of safe, cost when purchased (state whether new or second-hand), and give details of any descriptive markings on the door.
Whether illuminated and visible from the street at night
Are all the keys (including your Alarm, safe and Strong Room keys) removed from the premises outside business hours?
Are there any other special means of protection?
config.placeHolder: Are there any other special means of protection?

config.label: When was your last annual stocktaking?
Do you keep proper records of all sales purchases and transactions?
Have you ever sustained a loss or losses?
If so, give statement covering the past five years with particulars, including the amount of each loss, and, if insured, whether paid in full or otherwise

Is it your practice to give receipts for goods left with you by non-trade customers, for repair, valuation, sale, or any other purpose and to require surrender of such receipts before goods are returned to the customer?
Do you use entrustment/approbation notes in respect of all entrustments?
What is the Fire insurance rate on the contents of your premises?

Brokers Claim Handling Clause: A loss notification received by the Insurance Broker will be deemed as a loss notification to Insurer. All communications flowing between the Insurer, Insured and the appointed Loss Surveyor should be channelized through the Broker, unless there is any unavoidable reasons compelling direct communications between the parties
